entry.title: Newtral Ergonomic Office Chair With Adaptive Lumbar Support
entry.summary:
Vendor: HOINIO CHAIR
Type: Office Chairs
Price: 409.00

✈️ Free Delivery.

❤️ Warranty--3 years warranty maintenance.

📅 Handing Time--Ships within 48 hours after payment.

🚚 7 business days to customer, excluding remote AREAS in the US.(We will contact you if the goods cannot be delivered in remote areas)

💸 Fast Redund--100% Money Back Guarantee

💳 You can pay with PayPal.

• In stock, ready to ship

 

Born to Relieve Lumbar Pressure From Long Time Stting

【Why Choose HOINIO Chair】Sitting position without support to the lumbar spine creates nearly 50% increase in IVD（Intervertebral Lumbar Disc) pressure compared to sitting with lumbar support.The HOINIO chair is the only ergonomic chair that provides adaptive lumbar support for all sitting postures.

【American Ergonomist Endorsement】IRIS SOKOL, Founder of Ergowell, LLC,“The Newtral lifts your spine and helps provide you decompression of your lumbar discs. The lumbar function in the Newtral chair is one of the most unique lumbar supports I have seen.”

【Unique Adaptive Lumbar Support】HOINIO Office Chair with Lumbar Support has an auto chasing mechanism (first in the world for chairs), which automatically follows the movement of the lower back, providing strong lumbar support throughout the day. The intensity of the lumbar support can be adjusted to meet individual needs, it fits the natural curvature of your spine and can help relieves back pain.

【Multiple Adjustments】The backrest of the HOINIO ergonomic office chair can be reclined and locked into a variety of positions within a range of 96°-116°. The headrest can adjust in the angle and height providing the most comfortable position for your neck. The seat Seat lifts up and down and moves forward and back , plus 3D adjustable armrests for the ultimate in customized comfort in the office, or for gaming ! Adjustable ergonomic chair is suitable for people about 5'3" to 6'3". Loading Capacity up to 300 lbs.

【High -Quality】The HOINIO home office chair uses the the gas lift is high-quality KGS classe 4 made in Korea, and certified by BIFMA/SGS. Korea Filo Breathable Back Mesh to keep good air circulation in your back, perfect for longtime sitting.7cm high high-density sponge cushion seat for long sitting without collapse. Our office chairs are solid and durable, providing quality assurance for your healthy work and life.

【3 Years Warranty & Easy Assembly 】If our computer chairs have quality problems, please feel free to contact us by email (email address: support@newtral-chair.com), we promise 3-years warranty and replace the damaged product accessories for you free of charge. With clear instruction and tools, the desk chair is easy to assemble (about 15~20 minutes)

The intensity of the lumbar support can be adjusted to meet individual needs, it fits the natural curvature of your spine and can help relieves back pain.

【Multifunctional Adjustment】The backrest of the HOINIO ergonomic office chair can be reclined and locked within a range of 96°-126°. The angle and height adjustable headrest provides the most comfortable position for your neck. Seat lifts up and down and moves back and forth, plus 4D adjustable armrests for the ultimate in customized comfort in the office, or in front of your game! Adjustable ergonomic chair is suitable for people about 5'9" to 6'3". Loading Capacity up to 300 Ibs.

【High -Quality】The HOINIO home office chair uses the the gas lift is high-quality KGS classe 4 made in Korea, and certified by BIFMA/SGS. Korea Filo Breathable Back Mesh to keep good air circulation in your back, perfect for longtime sitting.7cm high high-density sponge cushion seat for long sitting without collapse.
